name: Saferoom
description:
Please take some time to read over the Known in-game issues before playing. We have also added a link to a feedback survey for testers to use after playing. 

Animator/Project Manager: Ann-Birgit Kristiansen

Art Manager/Programmer: Luca Smevik

_______________________________________________________________________________________

How To lauch gmae:

Download the .Zip fine

unpack the .Zip file

inside the WindowsNoEditor folder, launch the Test2D_Saferoom to launch game. 

Controls in hub (N/A): 
Arrow keys/WASD - Move up, down, left and right

P - Enter pause menu 

E - Interact 

Controls in battlescreen (N/A):
Arrow keys/WASD - Move up, down, left and right

P - Enter pause menu 

E - Interact 

Spacebar - Shoot

Controls in encounter area:
Arrow keys(WASD) - Move left and right

P - Enter pause menu 

E - Interact 

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Known in-game issues/ missing items:

Dialogue will not start by itself and has to be triggered by standing close to enemy and pressing E. 

No battle stage has been implemented yet.

Hub has not been implemented yet. 

Animation on background does not work,

Novo can walk right off the platform into a never-ending fall.

Dialogue box has not been finished, resulting in weird word formatting on text.
